types.name: Dog
types.description: Dogs are the most loyal pets, they are always happy to see you and they are always ready to play.

types.name: Cat
types.description: Cats are independent pets, they are always looking for a place to sleep and they are always ready to play.

types.name: Fish
types.description: Fish are the most relaxing pets, they are always swimming and they are always ready to play.

types.name: Bird
types.description: Birds are the most colorful pets, they are always singing and they are always ready to play.
